author: Richard Rubin
title: Tax Credits, Brackets, Deductions: How to Hold On to More of Your Dough
text:
You may have gotten used to how your tax return works, but it’s all about to change.
The 2017 tax returns being filed now through mid-April are the last ones that individuals will fill out under the old system.
The new rules, enacted by Congress in December, have already taken effect. But they won’t show up on tax returns until early in 2019.
...
